name: Compass Free 2018
description: Compass Free 2018 is the compass in your pocket, when you need it, where you need it.  Compass for Android 2018 shows direction of north, south, east and west, shows degrees in side window, has rotating bezel for advanced compass navigation.   Features of Compass Free 2018: - Simple to use, use it like a real compass - Professional design: Standard, Telescope, Night, Digital, Google Maps, Google Maps (satellite) - Background image - The dampened compass card, which swings naturally, orientates you with just one glance. - No internet connection required for Compass - Compass displays true north - Compass displays vertical line - Professional and optimized coding to keep application size as small as possible - Compass displays GPS Speedometer - Support many language - Its FREE  Download the best compass for free! Thank you for your using our app!
